response: PSEB major function is to register IT companies, call centers and freelancers in Pakistan and provide regulatory and corporate incentives and facilitation to them.

description: registration at pseb as FRC, CC, CO
response: Registration guidelines are at this link "https://pseb.org.pk/app". You can follow the explained steps to get registered. Visit PSEB site and move to the registration page and select the registration option of company, call center or freelancer. Go to that page and fill the form and submit for initial review of PSEB. You will be intimated by auto email on your submitted application.
PSEB charges Rs.20,000 for call center annual renewal and Rs. 10,000/- for renewal of each branch.

description: inform is it necessary to register with pseb
response: For voice operation business, call center registration is necessary to operate legally in the country, where as company and freelancer registration is not mandatory.

description: related benefit after registration with pseb
response: Certified/registered companies & freelancers can get incentives and facilitation furthermore call centers are also legalized.

description: about process of renewal for FRC, CC, CO
response: Visit PSEB registration portal, login to your application and update the form according the latest information and upload all required documents as requested by the system and submit your renewal application for PSEB review.

description: process for call center provisional extension
response: You can send a request for call center provisional extension by online before the end of the current provisional letter.

description: about number of extensions for call center
response: The call center can get the extension for one time only.

description: tells fee for call center extension
response: Currently PSEB did not charge any fee against the call center provisional extension.

description: tells when to start operation after certification
response: After getting the PSEB provisional letter, the call center has to apply for IP whitelisting and start the operations, after that call center have to apply for a verification visit to get the permanent certificate.
